casebody.data:
AZURE DOLPHIN, LLC, et al.
v.
BARTON, et al. 128A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 20, 2018 Peter J. Juran, M. Rachael Dimont, Winston-Salem, Chad A. Archer, Greensboro, Attorneys at Law, for Azure Dolphin, LLC, et al. Alan M. Ruley, Andrew A. Freeman, Attorneys at Law, Winston-Salem, for Barton, Justin

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 18th of June 2018 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of June 2018."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 16th day of August 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
